General summary

Road trip fans, listen up! Google Maps has a new feature called "Explore along your route" that suggests interesting local stops along your drive. No more digging for hidden gems - this tool finds them for you! Simply enter your destination, tap "Add stops," and explore the pins on the map or scroll through organized categories. Tap to select a location, read more about it, and add it to your trip. Happy exploring!
